page.title: 07MEDICAL CENTRES
page.content:
{Regional Blood Transfusion Centre.} (607942) Employs 230 to collect, blood group, test, tissue type from 1,500 unpaid voluntary donars every six months. This supplies 3.4 million sufferers from haemophilia, cardiac surgery, kidney and liver failures, e.t.c. {Brentwood District Hospital. } (604941) Two wards (ladies and mixed sex) with 50 beds, staffed by 100 nurses. Bed costs Â£120 per day. there is one operating theatre. Normal stay is 5-10 days. Day begins at 6am. Proposed change 1986 to Geriatric Unit.
{There is also the Nuffield Foundation {National Trust of considerable size. {However, all information was refused.
